title: Droven plate mail
data:
| \[   droven plate mail   [![Droven plate mail.png](/images/3/3e/Droven_plate_mail.png)](/wiki/File:Droven_plate_mail.png) |                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| Appearance                                                                                                                | crested black plate                              |
|                                                                                                                           |                                                  |
| Slot                                                                                                                      | [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor")      |
| AC                                                                                                                        | [6](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")             |
| Special                                                                                                                   | - [MC1](/wiki/MC1 "MC1")
- 6 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") |
|                                                                                                                           |                                                  |
| Base price                                                                                                                | 2000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")               |
| Weight                                                                                                                    | [85](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                      |
| Material                                                                                                                  | [shadowsteel](/wiki/Shadowsteel "Shadowsteel")   |

**Droven plate mail** is a type of [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"). It has a [default material](/wiki/Object_materials_\(dNetHack\) "Object materials (dNetHack)") of [shadowsteel](/wiki/Shadowsteel "Shadowsteel") and appears as **crested black plate** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification"), or as **crested plate mail** if the [hero](/wiki/Hero "Hero") is also [blind](/wiki/Blind "Blind").

## Generation

Droven plate mail is not randomly generated. [Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\)#dNetHack "Drow (starting race)") [heroes](/wiki/Hero "Hero") start with knowledge of droven plate mail, and drow [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger") will receive droven plate mail in place of the role's standard [cloak of displacement](/wiki/Cloak_of_displacement "Cloak of displacement").

Several [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") and other monsters can [generate with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") droven plate mail:

- [Stjarna-alfr](/index.php?title=Stjarna-alfr\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Stjarna-alfr (page does not exist)") are always generated with droven plate mail that has the symbol of [Eilistraee](/index.php?title=Eilistraee\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Eilistraee (page does not exist)") engraved on it.
- A [hedrow blademaster](/wiki/Hedrow_blademaster "Hedrow blademaster") is always generated with droven plate mail that has the symbol of his house engraved on it.
- [Drow matrons](/wiki/Drow_matron "Drow matron"), [drow matron-mothers](/wiki/Drow_matron-mother "Drow matron-mother"), and [yochlol](/wiki/Yochlol "Yochlol") generated in unearthly drow form are always generated with droven plate mail that has the symbol of [Lolth](/wiki/Lolth_\(dNetHack\) "Lolth (dNetHack)") engraved on it.
- [Myrkalfar matrons](/index.php?title=Myrkalfar_matron\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Myrkalfar matron (page does not exist)") are always generated with non-cursed +8 droven plate mail that is made of black [plastic](/wiki/Plastic "Plastic") and has the Last Bastion's symbol engraved on it.
- [Driders](/wiki/Drider_\(dNetHack\) "Drider (dNetHack)") and [sprow](/wiki/Sprow "Sprow") that are generated on the home level of any drow-related [quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") other than the [Drow Healer quest](/index.php?title=Drow_Healer_quest\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow Healer quest (page does not exist)") are created with cursed [erosion](/wiki/Erosion "Erosion")-proofed +3 droven plate mail that has the symbol of the character's starting house engraved on it. Other driders have a 2⁄5 chance of generating with droven plate mail.
- [Deminymphs](/wiki/Deminymph "Deminymph") that are randomly generated outside of the Drow Healer quest or the Lost Cities have an effective 1⁄320 chance of being given a madperson kit with droven plate mail that has an enchantment of +1 to +3, a random drow house's symbol and a 1⁄40 chance of being made into an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact"). The symbol has a 1⁄10 chance of belonging to Pen'a, a 3⁄10 chance of being Eilistraee's symbol, and will otherwise belong to a random fallen drow house.
- [Giant spiders](/wiki/Giant_spider "Giant spider") and [cave lizards](/index.php?title=Cave_lizard_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Cave lizard (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") have a 1⁄100 chance of generating with droven plate mail fitted to their body shape, while [large cave lizards](/index.php?title=Large_cave_lizard_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Large cave lizard (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") have a 3⁄100 chance of generating with fitted droven plate mail.
- [Dokkalfar eternal matriarchs](/wiki/Dokkalfar_eternal_matriarch "Dokkalfar eternal matriarch") in the [Anachrononaut quest](/wiki/Anachrononaut_quest "Anachrononaut quest") are generated with cursed +9 droven plate mail that have the symbol of their house engraved on it, while other dokkalfar eternal matriarchs are generated with blessed +9 droven plate mail that is made of black [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril") and has the symbol of their house engraved on it.

## Description

While worn, droven plate mail grants 6 base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC"), 6 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and [MC1](/wiki/MC1 "MC1"). As shadowsteel armor, droven chain mail has a chance of evaporating in lit squares, with the chance reduced if the wearer has MC3 or [invisibility](/wiki/Invisibility "Invisibility") - [erodeproofed](/wiki/Erodeproof "Erodeproof") droven plate mail will automatically repair partial evaporation while the wearer remains in an unlit square.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Droven_plate_mail\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Droven plate mail

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   droven plate mail  
Appearance crested black plate
Slot body armor
AC 6
Special
  • MC1
  • 6 DR
Base price 2000 zm
Weight 85
Material shadowsteel

Droven plate mail is a type of body armor that appears in dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack. It has a default material of shadowsteel and appears as crested black plate when unidentified, or as crested plate mail if the hero is also blind.

Generation

Droven plate mail is not randomly generated. Drow heroes start with knowledge of droven plate mail, and drow Rangers will receive droven plate mail in place of the role's standard cloak of displacement.

Several drow and other monsters can generate with droven plate mail:

  • Stjarna-alfr are always generated with droven plate mail that has the symbol of Eilistraee engraved on it.
  • A hedrow blademaster is always generated with droven plate mail that has the symbol of his house engraved on it.
  • Drow matrons, drow matron-mothers, and yochlol generated in unearthly drow form are always generated with droven plate mail that has the symbol of Lolth engraved on it.
  • Myrkalfar matrons are always generated with non-cursed +8 droven plate mail that is made of black plastic and has the Last Bastion's symbol engraved on it.
  • Driders and sprow that are generated on the home level of any drow-related quest other than the Drow Healer quest are created with cursed erosion-proofed +3 droven plate mail that has the symbol of the character's starting house engraved on it. Other driders have a 2⁄5 chance of generating with droven plate mail.
  • Deminymphs that are randomly generated outside of the Drow Healer quest or the Lost Cities have an effective 1⁄320 chance of being given a madperson kit with droven plate mail that has an enchantment of +1 to +3, a random drow house's symbol and a 1⁄40 chance of being made into an artifact. The symbol has a 1⁄10 chance of belonging to Pen'a, a 3⁄10 chance of being Eilistraee's symbol, and will otherwise belong to a random fallen drow house.
  • Giant spiders and cave lizards have a 1⁄100 chance of generating with droven plate mail fitted to their body shape, while large cave lizards have a 3⁄100 chance of generating with fitted droven plate mail.
  • Dokkalfar eternal matriarchs in the Anachrononaut quest are generated with cursed +9 droven plate mail that have the symbol of their house engraved on it, while other dokkalfar eternal matriarchs are generated with blessed +9 droven plate mail that is made of black mithril and has the symbol of their house engraved on it.

Description

While worn, droven plate mail grants 6 base AC, 6 DR and MC1. As shadowsteel armor, droven chain mail has a chance of evaporating in lit squares, with the chance reduced if the wearer has MC3 or invisibility - erodeproofed droven plate mail will automatically repair partial evaporation while the wearer remains in an unlit square.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Droven_plate_mail&oldid=172958"

The symbol has a {{frac|10}} chance of belonging to Pen'a, a {{frac|3|10}} chance of being Eilistraee's symbol, and will otherwise belong to a random fallen drow house. * [[Giant spider]]s and [[Cave lizard (dNetHack)|cave lizards]] have a {{frac|100}} chance of generating with droven plate mail fitted to their body shape, while [[Large cave lizard (dNetHack)|large cave lizards]] have a {{frac|3|100}} chance of generating with fitted droven plate mail. * [[Dokkalfar eternal matriarch]]s in the [[Anachrononaut quest]] are generated with cursed +9 droven plate mail that have the symbol of their house engraved on it, while other dokkalfar eternal matriarchs are generated with blessed +9 droven plate mail that is made of black [[mithril]] and has the symbol of their house engraved on it. ==Description== While worn, droven plate mail grants 6 base [[AC]], 6 [[DR]] and [[MC1]].
